author: erkoloco
title: DYOR Tool
description: With so many different projects being built, how can we assess them all using a consistent standardized framework?

author: machdiamond
title: Metadata Dictionary
description: The blockchain is a powerful accounting tool not being used to its full potential as an accounting tool.

author: raz
title: Codesign blockchain4good Principles
description: Lack of ‘blockchain4good’ guiding principles to guide a global movement + Cardano in achieving positive social and environmental impact.

author: cent
title: Standard for verification of NFTs
description: There is a lack of community driven resources and standards to further develop the NFT industry on Cardano.

author: vicepool
title: Avatarada
description: Users have to register/manage separate accounts for different Cardano projects. Poorly made projects can incur the leak of personal data.

author: sofi.heessen
title: Open Standards & Design Patterns
description: The ecosystem has many projects that require interconnectivity but without proper coordination these integration are difficult to achieve

author: fhilip.k
title: Authentication Protocol Work Group
description: Projects are working on Authentication solutions in isolation. Communication between these solutions is required.

author: ben.mesnik
title: Open Source Fungify
description: There are very few Plutus examples to reference, especially examples of entire dApps with complex contracts. This impedes development.

author: cardanonftalliance
title: A More Robust NFT standard
description: The current NFT ecosystem in Cardano doesn't have a complete standard that accounts for metadata, external data reference, and royalties.

author: heinz.gassner
title: DLT360: Governance RADAR Team
description: The DLT360 Risk & Opportunity Radar provides an effective overview about important governance aspects. This needs periodic review and update

author: benderthehuman
title: NFT as an event ticket
description: NFT's into mainstream ticketing so people can feel like it's an actual identity.

author: yeepeekoo
title: Sign-in with Cardano
description: Secure authentication into apps provided by social login put user's data at risk. Why can't we authenticate safely and privately via web3?

author: heinz.gassner
title: DLT360: Technology RADAR Team
description: The DLT360 Risk & Opportunity RADAR provides a clear view on technology topics and interoperability. This needs to be periodically updated

author: fhilip.k
title: Ideation Protocol Work Group
description: Projects working on ideation solutions are not communicating. Communication between these solutions is required.

author: newmindflow
title: NFT-Guild: NFT Royalty Standards
description: The discussions around NFT Royalty Standards have stalled. The CIP-27 solution has not been widely adopted by marketplaces.

author: proofspace.nick
title: PRISM VC Schema/Cred Definition
description: PRISM verifiable credential (VCs) is a plain unstructured JSON - unstandardised and hard to use for building trust networks

author: nicoarqueros
title: CIP Editor time Sebastien for 1year
description: Currently Sebastien (dcSpark CTO) acts as a Catalyst editor which requires a weekly time commitment. This proposal is to cover the time cost

author: rg.admin
title: Research Guild: Ecosystem Report
description: Cardano values academic rigor; however, the Catalyst community lacks coordinated research that investigates ‘open' ecosystem growth.

author: titan
title: Ouroboros-mini query specification
description: Ouroboros mini protocols are not entirely specified on the specification and thus is hard to create new clients

author: tienna
title: Open ISPO
description: ISPO or other forms of ISO should be renovated to support network decentralization and sustainability

author: jrepusseau
title: Open Certification and Traceability
description: Most of blockchain certification and traceability solutions are private, permissioned, there is a lack of research in common NFTs standards

author: davidtuan
title: Make learn Cardano easier
description: The Cardano Vietnamese community is missing an open encyclopedia site contains high-value info which is translated and justified by users

author: dzhuliana
title: Mentorship Incentivization DAO
description: Forming trusted mentorship relationships is important for transferring knowledge, but creating them over a large network is challenging

author: checkpoint
title: Community and Content Accessibilty
description: A lack of real content in multiverses and blockchain projects - a huge barrier to entry. No one knows how to distribute content. We do…

author: cardano4climate
title: Community collaboration standards
description: There are limited standards and tools for catalyst communities to operate and coordinate

author: matthiasksieber
title: Tenant Profile
description: Governments and nonprofits are not effectively solving the housing crisis. Tenants are more than their income.

author: algaetoken
title: Sustainable Business Standards
description: There is insufficient decentralised, globally distributed and sustainable business' on the Cardano ecosystem.

author: tomwedler
title: Marlowe for Financial Markets
description: Plutus and Haskell are hard to learn and unfamiliar to many prospective users. Many projects are waiting for Marlowe to launch on Cardano.
